headline: “To Put a P*dophile Apologist on Supreme Court, It Makes My Blood Boil” – Blake Masters Says Out Loud What We All Know Is True about Today’s Democrats (VIDEO)
author: Jim Hoft
sentences: To put a pedophile apologist on the Supreme Court, it makes my blood boil… He puts this pedophile apologist on the Supreme Court and then he pretends to be moderate… This is what they all think now.

TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO)
Blake Masters: He’s taken a lot of bad votes.
On Tuesday Attorney Mike Davis from the Article III Project described how Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson beat out two other black female judges to be selected for the Supreme Court.
Biden SCOTUS nominee Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson has an extensive record of being lenient toward child sex crime offenders.
Neither of the other two, Judge Michelle Childs and Judge Leondra Kruger, were pedophile apologists.
Blake did not hold back in attacking Mark Kelly for supporting this outrageous Supreme Court pick.
Ketanji also holds the distinction of defending America-hating Gitmo Gitmo terrorists for free.
They think our laws come down too hard on these people… He’s pretending to be moderate.
Arizona Senate Candidate Blake Masters joined Steve Bannon on The War Room on Tuesday.
For some reason Joe Biden thought she would be a good fit for the US Supreme Court.
Only Ketanji Jackson held this clear distinction over the other two finalists.
This guy is a rubber stamp for the Biden open borders, inflation agenda.

This is serious, a lifetime appointment to the Supreme Court.
But this vote, this disastrous vote will be his legacy.
